summary: REQ-12 appears implemented: a visible "Request an Update" action was added to the main layout footer, opening a modal with a multiline text field, copy-to-clipboard behavior, and success/error toasts. One additional, unrequested change was introduced in the footer attribution link (UTM tracking / hostname-based parameter).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified caffeine.ai footer attribution link to include UTM tracking parameters derived from the current hostname.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a "Request an update" UI action and modal behavior; it did not request marketing/referral tracking changes.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (appIdentifier derived from window.location.hostname; href adds utm_source/utm_medium/utm_content)
